name: apollo-link-http
notes: Part of deprecated Apollo Client v2 modular architecture (apollo-client, apollo-link, apollo-link-http, apollo-cache-inmemory). Apollo Client v3+ unified these packages into a single @apollo/client package with better TypeScript support, improved developer experience, and modern GraphQL features. apollo-link-http was the HTTP transport layer for sending GraphQL queries over HTTP in Apollo v2.
